712420.name: The Low Road - Win Well - Songs On The Low Road
712420.description:
"Songs On The Low Road" is an EP that includes all of the vocal tracks from the point and click adventure game, The Low Road, written and performed by Win Well.

All files are in .mp3 format and are located in the "Win Well - Songs On The Low Road" sub directory.

Released July 25, 2017

All songs appear in The Low Road, a point-and-click adventure game by XGen Studios.
712420.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
